title: GetEnumItems
content: </> Enum.GetEnumItems() → EnumItem[] Returns an array containing all of the EnumItem options available for this enum.

title: EnumType
content: This item is read only and cannot be modified. Read Only </> EnumItem.EnumType: string The type of the EnumItem.

title: Name
content: This item is read only and cannot be modified. Read Only </> EnumItem.Name: string The name of the EnumItem.

title: Value
content: This item is read only and cannot be modified. Read Only </> EnumItem.Value: any The value of the EnumItem.

title: IsA
content: </> EnumItem.IsA(EnumType: string) → boolean Returns if the EnumItem is of the given EnumType.

title: new
content: </> Enums.new() → Enum Creates a new Enum. Overwrites existing Enums including Roblox Enums.

title: Find
content: </> Enums:Find( enumName: string-- The name of the Enum. ) → Enum Safe way of checking if an Enum exists and returns it if it does.

title: FromValue
content: </> Enums:FromValue( enumName: string,-- The name of the Enum. enumValue: any-- The value of the EnumItem. ) → EnumItem Given an Enum's name and the EnumItem's value, returns the EnumItem.

title: GetStandardEnums
content: </> Enums:GetStandardEnums() → Enum Returns the standard Roblox Enum table defined globally. This is useful for when this library is imported under the name Enum.
